officialTitle: Randomized Double Blind Controlled Trial of the Value of Robotic Rectopexy for the Treatment of Complex Pelvic Floor Dysfunction
inclusionCriteria:
* women
* proven pelvic floor dysfunction
* informed consent
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Age \<18 years old
* Patient unable to communicate or to understand the study
* Patient refusing to participate to the study
* contraindication to laparoscopy
